item.description:
CHICAGO

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

Pre- Party starts at 6:30 PM. Show starts at 8:00 PM.

Follow the link to pay for tickets

We'll be sharing this event with the CT Theatre Group and Singles Area Museum Meetup. Follow the link and buy your tickets ahead of time. We meet at a restaurant beforehand to pick up tickets, mingle and eat dinner. If you buy through the CT Theatre Group, you'll be seated with us. Details on the Pre-Party location to follow. You can also skip dinner with the group and pick up your tickets at the will call window.

I've been to a play with CT Theatre Group. It was a great time. They're a friendly group with many singles. This is a small theater and there aren't really any bad seats.

http://www.cttheatregroup.org/Events/Chicago-Playhouse-on-Park-West-Hartford-CT-Connecticut.htm

FREE SAFE PARKING

Pre-Party starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm

Advance Tickets are $25

Tickets are $30 at the event

A universal tale of fame, fortune and all that jazz with one show-stopping-song after another and the most astonishing dancing you've ever seen. This sharp edged satire features a dazzling score that sparked
immortal staging by Bob Fosse.
item.how_to_find_us: Details to follow. I'll update this closer to the time of the show. I'll supply my cell number to those attending.
item.name: The musical, CHICAGO, with Pre-Party, Playhouse on Park, West Hartford 7/16/11
